alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells; Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 1:53PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pima and southwestern Pinal Counties through 245 PM MST... At 152 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Hickiwan, or 14 miles east of Ajo, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ajo, Hickiwan, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument, Why, Charco 27, Ventana, Gunsight and Vaya Chin. This includes the following highways... Route 85 between mile markers 33 and 63. Route 86 between mile markers 53 and 63. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
